meanings.sent1: After the storm, he relighted the candles in the house.
meanings.sent2: She quickly relighted the match to see in the dark room.
meanings.sent3: The magician relighted the candle with a snap of his fingers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile relighted the gloomy atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise relighted the sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The relighted room looked cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent2: The relighted lantern illuminated the path ahead.
meanings.sent3: The relighted stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent4: Her relighted enthusiasm was contagious to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The relighted fire warmed their cold hands on the winter night.
